titles.title: Public Land Job Creation Act of 2015
A bill to ensure that Federal Register notices submitted to the Bureau of Land Management are reviewed in a timely manner.
Public Land Job Creation Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Public Land Job Creation Act of 2015
This bill gives the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) 45 days to review a state BLM notice for submission to the Federal Register. If the review has not been completed: (1) the notice shall consider to be approved, and (2) the state BLM office shall immediately forward the notice to the Federal Register for publication.
